pr_title: AbstractIcon: Null Protection for ImageIcons and Separating Dialogs out from the Choosers beneath

Dividing between dialogs and choosers as part of implementing LayeredForceIconDialog
Fixing issues found during personal review

replies.bodyText: Annoying IDE automatic format when copying/pasting that I cannot find how to turn off. Fixed.
